Class ChessPiece

java.lang.Object
ChessPiece
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessPieceContract
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook
public abstract class ChessPiece extends Object implements ChessPieceContract
Abstract base class for all chess pieces.

    • ChessPiece

      public ChessPiece(int row, int col, Color color)
      Constructor for a chess piece.
      Parameters:
      row - the initial row (0-7)
      col - the initial column (0-7)
      color - the color of the piece
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if row or column is out of bounds

      public boolean canKill(ChessPiece piece)
      Description copied from interface: ChessPieceContract
